name: rana ahmad
comment: I am writing to express my extreme frustration and disappointment with the pathetic level of customer service I have received from your bank. Over the past few days, I have called your helpline multiple times just to confirm whether I have met the spending threshold required for the reversal of my annual credit card fee‚Äîa simple query that remains unanswered due to your agents consistently dropping the call after 4 to 5 minutes. Today again, after waiting on hold for 6 minutes, the call was dropped once more.

name: Sulaman Toor
comment: Best ha

name: Ali Butt
comment: I have to say. This is one of the most pathetic banks I've ever witnessed and I have a lot of bank account and different types of accounts. The branch staff is clueless. The Bank Manager is clueless. I don't know what's the hiring criteria of Standard Chartered Bank. Very poor standard. Go somewhere else and save yourself some headache. And specially counter 2 wali anti, unko tou bs aapne bachon ki fikar rehti. New account open karwaya or mail ai k bank visit kren, bank aya 4hrs kyc hi nae hori kabhi koi drama kabi letter head pe likho kabi koi drama. Low Standard Chartered.

name: Amer Rasul
comment: Courteous staff, excellent service. Although most banking needs are taken care of with alternative delivery channels, but sometimes it becomes inevitable to visit the bank. This was one such instance.

name: Riq Al
comment: Helpful and cooperative staff. Long queues on cash counters usually. 2 ATMs inside the bank. Comfortable seating available for waiting. Bank is usually quite busy as located in the centre of the city. Parking area is available. Can be tricky to find a spot at peak hours.

name: Shahid Mehmood
comment: I personal think the best bank in pakistan because they provide outstanding services online and in branch.

name: Mubashir Ashraf Rasheed
comment: I have to say. This is one of the most pathetic banks I've ever witnessed and I have a lot of bank account and different types of accounts. The branch staff is clueless. The Bank Manager is clueless. I don't know what's the hiring criteria of Standard Chartered Bank. Very poor standard. Go somewhere else and save yourself some headache.

comment:
Check deposit machine wasn't working.
Security guard said, it won't work.if you want to keep trying then you can but it won't work .
This branch is at premium location in Lahore but what's the point of having a CDM if it's not working?

name: muhammad adeel
comment:
I was registered my self in FBR as a filer. After that i was go to anarkali branch to withdraw cash,i was asked casher i am show there as a filer he didn't respond properly and say me"if it's show on my computer then you are considered filer" but he didn't confirm me or guide he how can i submit my filer documents on it's he cash my check and cut "With Holding Tax" from my account. Guiding Procedures is not good
But now i want to know how can i update my status as a filer on my account.
Regards
Adeel Mughal

name: SAM JAMIL
comment: Third class bank. Rude staff and they do not guide you properly. Their quality of services decreasing day after day. This bank is becoming worst day after day.

name: Safdar Qadri
comment: Worst Branch Banking experience. Standard Chartered Bank has very good online banking services but Sub Standard Branch Banking. I was maintaining an account with SCB for last 20 years. I had to close my account due to services and behavior of staff of this branch. Employees of this branch are ignorant, inefficient and arrogant.

name: MUHAMMAD IMRAN
comment:
Standard chartered bank is the best international bank in Pakistan.
This branch is located in Gulberg opposite McDonald.
In this branch staff is very cooperative and helpful with customers. They resolve the customers issues in a very respectful manner.
I like this branch and the staff working there very much.

name: Zia Saeed
comment: Well I had a very bad experience with this bank. I needed some change for the eid. I went to the manger room she wasn't in her room. Secondly when she came back she was on a phone call and told me to wait outside. I waited for at least 15 minutes. She came out and I discussed my concern to her. She then said to me please go to the counter and I told her there are not giving us the right customer service. Even though being a manager she did not knew that if they have enough change in their bank and trying to act like an unknown Person who doesn't know that what's going on into the bank. Her name was karmani saab. The Guy on the customer service department telling me her name karmani Saab rather than her full name. Kindly support this review to develop the maturity of banking. I wish I could upload the photo of that manger when she was on a phone call

name: M R
comment: You can expect consistently poor customer service, even in Priority Banking. If it's supposed to take 5 minutes, you can expect it to take 3 weeks. System is always down, staff is argumentative and rude, everything and everyone works at a snail's pace, so many unnecessary steps and paperwork to do basic things.

name: Mati ul Haq
comment: Standard chartered is a United Kingdom based bank operational in many coumtries with online international banks connected with each other through their secure network. It is one of the most advanced and user friendly bank in Pakistan and provide all types of banking facilities to their customers. Most of their services are online and they also provide self banking services in yheir branches.

name: Atique Ur Rehman
comment: Worst bank ever....for cash deposit and for withdrawl you have to wait 3 to 4 hours.....non cooperative staff and rude......worst not recommended.....ab konsa zamana ha itna wait ka ......you can see only fees challan etc ,its mean people dont waste their time in these types of bank..... Its 21 century and why these banks are even existed ......in lahore only some branches are left ... Month by month branches are getting rare .....only 2 3 branches left in lahore city

comment: op-notch quality and super fast service!

name: TM Tiger
comment: The ambience and cleanliness of the place is awesome as this has to be like that as it's their main headquarter in Lahore. Good staff. Good service. Nice people. A must visit place if you want to open a bank account in meezan bank and u live or work near gulberh.

name: Izma Rao
comment:
I had an extremely disappointing experience with Meezan Bank. The operational staff, particularly Adil, and the consumer desk representative, Hassan Latif, displayed unprofessional behavior and a dismissive attitude. Over the course of two days, my time was wasted due to inefficiencies and a complete lack of customer care.
Instead of providing solutions, the staff made me feel humiliated. Such treatment is unacceptable in a professional environment. I expected better service, but unfortunately, Meezan Bank failed to meet even basic standards.
If you value your time and dignity, I strongly recommend exploring other banking options

name: Muhammad Arif
comment: Today I visited Gulberg Branch Lahore for the purpose of home remittances receive which is sent by one of my friend from USA. I entered bank premises at 10:10 am. I asked about the RIA payment receiving counter, he told me counter 7 is the RIA counter. The banker named Chaudhary Zaigham Abbas asked me to wait for 10 minutes. After 10 minutes, he told me to go to perform biometric verification. After biometric verification, he again asked me to wait. The tone he used is very harsh and rude and very unprofessional. ''PEECHE JAKE WAIT KER LO KERNA HAI TOU, AUR KHARRE REHNA TOU KHARRE RAHO'. He used these words in very rude tone. I am very disappointed over this rude behavior. After 10 minutes of waiting, he continued to verify my documents and told me to collect cash from cash counter. On this counter, I again face a problem, he said no cash is available and said wait for 10 minutes till the cash arrives. I was not expecting this behavior form such a good bank.

name: Waleed Ashraf
comment: Staff is soo rude. I needed Euros in exchange of PKR i visited exchange also and literally worst experience.

name: Elbert
comment: I am open account in mezan bank this staff is very nice

name: Waqas Khwaja
comment: Meezan Bank is the premier Islamic bank if the country. The gulberg branch staff is very courteous. Overall good experience whenever you visit the branch with efficient service provided by the Meezan team

name: Secret Entertainment
comment: The services and products of the Meezan Bank are commendable, but the behaviour of some staff, especially female supervisor has been unprofessional and unacceptable. To ensure a positive customer experience, it is very important for Meezan Bank to prioritize hiring well-educated and trained staff.

name: Talha Asad
comment: One of the most non professional and irresponsible bank I have ever been to. No one picks up the phone number of this branch, nor do they entertain basic requests, like change of address. Stopped using them

name: Maaz Nadeem Butt
comment: I would rate 0 stars if I could. The representative gave me wrong information and acted like she solved the problem. I could totally tell she was just trying to get rid of me

name: AyAnn
comment: My account has been dormant for the past 4 years and despite many emails to customer care and complaints center all I receive is a generic response which is very frustrating. In person services are very good no doubt but their online service sucks. Pakistanis who are living abroad are suffering due to their inefficiency in online services.

name: Abdullah Nawaz
comment: Worst branch I have ever visit in banking sector with uneducated and non professional staff. even they don't know how to deal with a client. I suggest at least hire professionals and educated employees.

name: Usman Khan Yousafzai
comment:
The branch has been going downhill for sometime with some of the worst customer service available. The staff is rude and the personal manager is the same. They neither respect the customers nor have any proper information regarding the banking policies of Meezan Bank. The head office should take immediate actions to rectify this and especially bring the bank personal manager in line who was especially rude and aggressive.

With service like this, Meezan will struggle to maintain their place amongst the growing banks of Pakistan

name: Umar Naseer
comment: Best bank..best services ‚ù§Ô∏èüëç

name: Mustafa Zaheer
comment: I had really bad experience with the staff even there Managers the staff really unprofessional and the online signup is too much time taking and the service is too much bad I never ever recommend this to use Meezan. Bank services

name: Rok Guru
comment: I would give it minus rating if I could. First off the branch environment was disgusting, not welcoming and clutter was everywhere. The teller I dealt with was not visible and hidden by a giant sign. I got to cash my remittance, the teller seemed unhappy about my presence there and body language showed his unwillingness to help. He communicated in one or two word answers and then said that his system is not working and I should go to a different bank. What a waste of time

name: Imtiaz Sarwar
comment: It was very good branch when I had open my account first time in 2021. Still I'm using the same account and I have no issue till now. At that time the Management and employee were really nice and cooperative. In 2024, when I visited the same branch it's looked like they have some issues.

name: bahauddin din
comment: Very very bad experience incompetent staff bad service

name: Ishtiaq Bokhari
comment: Good bank. The bank serves a large community in the area. The bank is always busy perhaps due to the reason that there are not many beaches around to cater all the clients nearby. Once i discussed something work the manager and i found him very helpful.

name: Asad Ali
comment: That's a amazing Bank as well as online banking so much good system according to all online banking (Maybe). But banking staff is not to be good for peoples because He has almost all staff running management by own. so kindly hire a good persons for a dealing from peoples

name: Mustafa Asif
comment: Good work and cooperative bank staff

name: Usman Ali
comment: Very good service and time value of money.

name: Abdul Kareem
comment: I have account in Gulberg Branch Lahore and currently living in UAE. comment: Standard Chartered Bank, a global financial stalwart, brings its exceptional services to I-8, Islamabad, through its dedicated branch. With a commitment to excellence, the I-8 branch stands as a financial hub, offering a range of services that blend international standards with local convenience. From personalized banking solutions to cutting-edge financial products, Standard Chartered's I-8 branch is not just a bank; it's a trusted partner in the financial journey of the community, providing a seamless blend of global expertise and local reliability.

comment:
This is probably the best Daewoo terminal in Punjab with good refreshments options.

Always keep an eye on washrooms cleanliness.

Some drivers drive rush (zig-zag) on longer routes with sudden brakes at time, feedback should be taken from the passengers at the end of trip.

Buses association should demand Government to fix roads in small cities, especially from Sukkhar to Karachi. Cleanliness and good roads are essential for transport and tourism activities.

comment: The ambience and cleanliness of the place is awesome as this has to be like that as it's their main headquarter in Lahore. Good staff. Good service. Nice people. A must visit place if you want to open a bank account in meezan bank and u live or work near gulberh.

name: Izma Rao
comment:
5 months ago
I had an extremely disappointing experience with Meezan Bank. The operational staff, particularly Adil, and the consumer desk representative, Hassan Latif, displayed unprofessional behavior and a dismissive attitude. Over the course of two days, my time was wasted due to inefficiencies and a complete lack of customer care.
Instead of providing solutions, the staff made me feel humiliated. Such treatment is unacceptable in a professional environment. I expected better service, but unfortunately, Meezan Bank failed to meet even basic standards.
If you value your time and dignity, I strongly recommend exploring other banking options

name: Muhammad Arif
comment: Today I visited Gulberg Branch Lahore for the purpose of home remittances receive which is sent by one of my friend from USA. I entered bank premises at 10:10 am. I asked about the RIA payment receiving counter, he told me counter 7 is the RIA counter. The banker named Chaudhary Zaigham Abbas asked me to wait for 10 minutes. After 10 minutes, he told me to go to perform biometric verification. After biometric verification, he again asked me to wait. The tone he used is very harsh and rude and very unprofessional. ''PEECHE JAKE WAIT KER LO KERNA HAI TOU, AUR KHARRE REHNA TOU KHARRE RAHO'. He used these words in very rude tone. I am very disappointed over this rude behavior. After 10 minutes of waiting, he continued to verify my documents and told me to collect cash from cash counter. On this counter, I again face a problem, he said no cash is available and said wait for 10 minutes till the cash arrives. I was not expecting this behavior form such a good bank

Poor staff who do not know to behave customers rspecially belonging to educated class. They were not ready to work due to laziness even it was as per rule in the bank near by it.
I believe that such staff members will very soon put the name of this bank into mud which this bank holds.
I never recommend revisit.

name: Abdullah Armash
comment:
AOA,

Complain

Details of MBL Employee:
Name : Sayed Hasnain Asghar
Designation: Branch Officer

On 21-Apr-2025, I sent to my brother to MBL branch Sector C Bahria Town Lahore, to cash my cheque.
After long wait and procedural delay in MBL branch of 45 minutes and doing all his formalities (by HASNAIN ASHAR) of CBC / call / ID card copies. At end he said that sign of account holder does not match. He gave instructions to my brother to call the account holder in Branch (every time when I used to cheque my cash).
I gone by my self all the way to MBL branch to resolve the issue. He was having NO embarrassment same like bureaucratic attitude in Pakistan.

The thing is that every business sector must facilitate to their clients, rather to put them in hassle and delays.

Always very disappointed in MBL branch (located at Plot # 59-B, Sector C, Bahria Town, Lahore).

name: jameel ur rehman
comment: On Friday, there is no sign outside the bank stating how long the bank will remain closed.

name: Muhammad Zubair
comment: Its their weekly melo drama they lock ATM and go away. So the cash will not run out from ATM. Who ever in charge You can fool your department by showing uptime like this not the costumers.

name: shamama masood
comment: Meezan has one of the most pathetic bank applications ever. I have been trying to access the app for over four weeks, and I am still unable to login due to unidentified errors. I have called the helpline several times but my they keep going in circles without providing a solution to my problem. Pathetic service

name: zahid mustafa
comment: Have a very bad experience opening an account, I have already an RDA account, therefore, I have provided the same documents that I submitted during the opening of the RDA account however, there is one lady Mrs. Sadaf who is asking the additional requirements, after wasting the 4 days she agree to open an account but she told me, she can‚Äôt provide the gold ATM/debit card, only she can provide the pay pal card, after very long argument and discussion with operation manager she agreed to provide the gold card. Overall Meezan Bank is very good, but the Bahria Town branch staff is very unethical

name: Mohiuddin Khan
comment: Extremely poor service at Meezan Bank Bahria Town Branch

name: sheharyar ejaz
comment:
Went for receive home remittance took tokan and wait 30 mins then on counter after checking online they said take new token for receive your money on different counter seriously i have been waiting for so long on pervious token now i have to take new token for receive money.
After waiting another 45 minutes finally i received my money now i realize why overseas Pakistanis Prefer HUNDDI.

name: Adnan Mirza
comment: Good and friendly staff, however security guards are rudes, but I must appreciate Sheriyar who is responsibility is opening account, that guy who is sitting at clearing/clearance chair is very friendly and responsible person, I forgot my ID card there and he kept it safe, thanks sir if you are reading this, lady who sit beside him is also friendly, and manager is also very cooperative, I don't know about other branches but this branch of meezan bank is very rushy, yet staff behaviour is beautiful even office boys are cooperative. I hope they continue with that momentum. Strange I am the first who write about this branch. Good luck.

name: Omer Malik
comment: Worst experience I had in meezan bank. They don't focus on customers. Also officers in their helpline are not co operative.

Go to any other branch and the account will be opened the same day. Pathetic service.

comment: If you do not use your Meezan's debit card, the bank will give you the ticket but due to not having the card they harass you by making you wait for 1 hour or more, and the excuse they give is that we give priority to card holders. who processing it at counter 2 was really nice afterwards even offered me a candy as well. Overall very pleasant experience.

name: Syed Abdul Wahab
comment:
I had terrible experience here.

Firstly, only one counter was working and staff was really slow.

Secondly, when I ask a guy that "do I have to fill deposit slip for Goethe?" He said no directly go to counter. When I went to counter after waiting 40 minutes (only one counter was working and everyone was relaxing and keep in mind I went there early around 12-1PM when there are not so many customers still it took them hell out of time) The lady asked me to fill deposit slip.
It shows that their staff don't have knowledge and they come to work to relax.
Worst HBL branch or worst bank in the world

name: Catalin Gangalic
comment:
The terminal is pretty good for a bus station in Pakistan.
First of all, it offers actual functioning AC across the waiting area.
Second, the bathrooms are clean and easy to use. The staff is pretty helpful, too.
Finally, even ATMs are available for usage inside. The big drawback is that not real public transit to city center is available, requiring a taxi or moto.

name: Mati ul Haq
comment: Visited multiple times for bill payments. Thier staff is cooperative and handle customer ls with well attitude. Ambaiance is good and temperature is well conteolled insude the bank. They are offerring all types of banking services currently offerend in Pakistan. ATM is available 24 hours and on public holidays too.

name: Aminath Ushwa Ali
comment:
Shoutout where it's due!
I know HBL usually gets a lot of heat, but I just had a surprisingly positive experience that deserves a mention.
Faced a fraudulent transaction on 6th May 2025 of around $1300+ and was fully expecting the usual ‚Äúwait 75 working days‚Äù runaround. But huge shoutout to Arsalan Rasheed from HBL who not only took my case seriously but actually helped me get my money back within 6 hours. Yes, SIX HOURS on a platform where delays and dead ends are more common than quick resolutions.
Professional, responsive, and genuinely helpful. Arsalan restored a bit of faith in a system that often feels broken.
If only more employees at HBL had this level of efficiency and care. Credit where it‚Äôs due. HBL please give him a raise.

name: Sobban Khan
comment: Extremely nice Staff to entertain customers. Separate space to sit and fill deposit slips. Enough street parking and strongly recommend it for all

name: Ali Raza
comment:
ZERO RATING FOR CUSTOMER TRUST AND SERVICE
> My 15+ year old HBL account (A/C 10847901766655) was unlawfully closed by the Head Office without any prior notice or justification, effectively locking my balance of PKR 14,000.
> I have exhausted all channels: the branch, the helpline, and HBL's official email support. No one can provide a reason or solution. This action has severely damaged my business operations.
> The arbitrary closure of a long-standing customer's account is highly unprofessional and violates basic banking standards. A formal complaint has now been filed with the State Bank of Pakistan (SBP).
> I demand immediate reinstatement of my account and contact from a senior official. Avoid HBL if you value your funds and business continuity.

name: Sheikhs
comment: Modern design building, one of the best banks of Pakistan. The building has the most secure ATM in that area. The staff is very courteous.

name: Raheem Asif
comment: I had the pleasure of working with Mr. Amjad Khan at this branch and was thoroughly impressed by their professionalism and efficiency. They were knowledgeable, attentive, and ensured that every step of the process was smooth and straightforward. I truly appreciated the prompt communication and their ability to address all my queries with clarity and patience‚Äîa great example of excellent customer service in the banking industry.

name: Usama Ghani
comment: Efficient and reliable banking experience at the HBL Hussain Agahi Branch! Located conveniently on Hussain Agahi Road, this branch offers full services‚Äîincluding Islamic banking and ATM facilities‚Äîwith helpful and polite staff. The premises are accessible and well-maintained, and the banking process is generally smooth and professional. Definitely a solid choice for most banking needs.

name: Daniyal Khan
comment:
An excellent branch for any banking operation. The staff is always timely, their attitudes are perfect, they are knowledgeable about what the banks services and their operations.
I have been availing their services for a long time, and I am more than satisfied with the staff's assistance.
Even when after relocation to another city, their staff have accommodated me on matters that other banks/branches fail to do.
Hats-off to the staff of this branch for not only catering to Karachi residents, but also customers from other cities. and the best part is, that it is the most busiest branch in Karachi, and yet their service is amazing.
Keep up the great work!

name: Saif Feroze
comment: Honest Feedback: I'm not someone who leaves bad reviews. But please improve your service. More counters needed! Service is extremely slow. Anyone coming here should expect 40 to 120 minutes wait before their turn arrives

comment: Very Nice Service by Recipients Female Staff Very Kind Behavior with Senior Citizens üëè

name: Kauser Abbas
comment:
HBL is one of the oldest and largest banks in the country and this branch in Shadman market is very old too.
Being in the commercial and residential area branch building is very congested and customers have to suffer a lot. Parking is another issue here.
Staff is efficient but space can't be widened.

name: Behram Khan
comment:
I recently visited the HBL Prestige Branch in F7 and felt that the experience did not meet my expectations as a Prestige customer. The branch seemed disorganized, and the service was not as attentive as I would have hoped for.

When I compare this to my experience with Meezan Bank, where the service is consistently smooth and customer-focused, I can't help but feel that there's room for improvement at HBL. While I understand that every visit may not be perfect, I believe there is potential for HBL to enhance the customer experience, especially for those who are part of their Prestige program.

I hope the management considers refining their service to better align with the standards their Prestige customers expect.

Pathetic services. never recommend
